title: 6-Gingerol Alleviates NNK-Induced Lung Carcinogenesis by Boosting Antioxidation and Reducing Inflammation.
abstract: With lung cancer rates climbing steadily, the development of effective prevention strategies has become more crucial than ever. Our previous research has revealed that ginger oil possesses potential lung cancer preventive activity, demonstrating inhibitory effects against tobacco carcinogen 4-(Methylnitrosamino)-1-(3-pyridyl)-1-butanone (NNK)-induced lung cancer in A/J mice. 6-Gingerol, a bioactive compound from ginger (
